alert.note: Alert for Grand Forks (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 4:19PM CDT until June 20 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Marshall County in northwestern Minnesota... Northwestern Polk County in northwestern Minnesota... West central Pennington County in northwestern Minnesota... East central Grand Forks County in northeastern North Dakota... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 419 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mallory, or near Grand Forks, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mallory around 420 PM CDT. Davidson around 425 PM CDT. Key West around 430 PM CDT. Sherack around 435 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Euclid. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 136 and 142. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
